my_business: Mohsha Digital Solutions Pvt Ltd, led by Mohamed Sharafudeen, is a customer-centric marketing technology company. We help Manufacturing and Fintech businesses significantly grow their revenue by crafting profitable digital marketing strategies. We address common challenges, including underperforming Google & Meta Ads, low marketing ROI, and the need for increased online leads. Leveraging data and cutting-edge tools, we empower companies with annual revenues of ₹2 Cr - ₹10 Cr and monthly marketing budgets of ₹2L - ₹5L to double their online sales and leads, driving sustainable business growth.
top_product: 1. Paid Advertising 2. Customer Acquisition 3. Consulting for Equity Our core offer is we provide a Full-Suite Digital Marketing solution to 3x our client's business revenue. We will also be a Fractional CMO for your company to achieve this goal.
ideal_referral: Our Perfect Business Partners We help specific kinds of businesses grow a lot. Here's who we're looking for: 1. How Much Money They Make (Revenue): They earn ₹2 Crore to ₹10 Crore each year. This means they're ready for bigger growth. 2. How Much They Spend on Marketing (Budget): They spend ₹2 Lakh to ₹5 Lakh each month on marketing. This shows they're serious about getting more customers. We want to help companies that are doing well and ready to invest in telling more people about what they do! When you talk to business owners, especially in Manufacturing or Fintech, listen for these problems. If they say something like this, they might need us: 1. "My Google Ads aren't working." 2. "We're spending a lot on marketing, but not seeing results." 3. "Our website traffic has dropped." 4. "We need more online leads." 5. "How do we get the most from our digital marketing money?" 6. "We want to sell much more online."
top_problem_solved: We helped our client attract ten new clients per month, which was their target audience. They wanted group tours, so we targeted that and achieved the result they wanted. The client is into tours and travel. Now, I am working for a Manufacturing company as a fractional CMO. Their target is to acquire five new B2B businesses. We just started, and I will update you on the results soon.
my_favourite_bni_story: During my BNI journey, I consistently channelled a substantial amount of business to a particular member in BNI. This went on for well over a year. During that entire time, I didn't get a single referral back from them. There were moments when I questioned the "Givers Gain" principle, wondering if my efforts would truly yield any reciprocal benefits. However, I continued to operate from a place of giving, trusting in the process. Then, a specific business need arose for me – a perfect fit for this member's network. I decided to directly ask them for a referral, explaining precisely what I was looking for. What happened next was remarkable. The referral came through instantly, and to my astonishment, it quickly converted into a solid piece of business. There was no delay, no hesitation, just a direct and impactful connection. This experience was a profound lesson. It wasn't about a tit-for-tat exchange, but about cultivating a deep relationship built on trust and consistent value. When the right moment arrived, and I made a specific request, the foundation of giving I had laid paid off handsomely. It wasn't about tracking who gave what to whom, but about the genuine spirit of helping others, knowing that in due course, the universe (or in this case, my BNI network) would reciprocate when it mattered most. This solidified my unwavering belief in the power and wisdom of "Givers Gain Philosophy."
